comments.creator: mattm@letsencrypt.org
comments.raw_text:
See test case, attached. Since none of the boxes overflow, they should all render similarly.

It appears setting the overflow attribute causes -moz-box-pack: end to not function as desired: The content does not appear at the bottom of the box.
comments.text:
Created attachment 565719
Test with all overflow values.

See test case, attached. Since none of the boxes overflow, they should all render similarly.

It appears setting the overflow attribute causes -moz-box-pack: end to not function as desired: The content does not appear at the bottom of the box.
